lines.text: Well, if I can't take it with me, then I'm not going!
Read to me what's on this pretty paper, Louie.

[Louie puts an apple on his head]
Duh, what's that for, Louie?
You wanna play games, don't ya? Well we're gonna play William Tell.
Oh, boy! William Tell, William Tell! Duh... Who is he?

[Heathcliff is choking]
Breathe, stupid, breathe! You forgot to breathe again.

[Takes deep breath]
Duh, that's much better, Louie.
You was right, Louie. I'm four. I found my birth certificate and it says I'm four.
[unrolls parchment which reads "Birth Certificate - You're Four"]
